name: microcosmic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the same characteristics as something larger: The case offers a microcosmic look at a national trend. The artist has somehow created a landscape that is both grand and microcosmic.
More examplesFewer examplesThis intimate theatre space is an appropriate venue for a microcosmic look at a terrible period in world history.Panoramic views were few in the mist, but the microcosmic nature around us was beautiful.The performance provided an opportunity to see a microcosmic view of the practice of the world's most famous orchestra.
